name: Fresh Pudding
description:
This is a concept By Fresh03 & Alfred Pudding I mixed on our show :) 
Full Description and how this came about is here: https://youtu.be/nvqlu_ZcqhI?t=4363
author: DIYDownunderPippa

reviews.text: I enjoyed this one, interesting with the VT Devon cream,  I recently got these VT flavours and I think I'll have to SFT to work out what each brings to this recipe, but that VT banana custard is a winner, really nice banana recipe. Good job guys!
